tool.name: queries.gene_coordinates
tool.description: Retrieve gene coordinates for specific organism through BioMart.

configfiles.configfile:
import scanpy.api as sc
sc.queries.gene_coordinates( host = '$host', org = '$org', gene : = '$gene :', chr_exclude : = '$chr_exclude :',)

param.name: host
param.label: host
param.help: A valid BioMart host URL. Can be used to control genome build.

param.name: org
param.label: org
param.help: Organism to query. Currently available are human ('hsapiens') and mouse ('mmusculus').

param.name: gene :
param.label: gene :
param.help: The gene symbol (e.g. 'hgnc_symbol' for human) for which to retrieve coordinates.

param.name: chr_exclude :
param.label: chr_exclude :
param.help: A list of chromosomes to exclude from query.

data.name: A `pd.DataFrame` containing gene coordinates for the specified gene symbol.
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: A `pd.DataFrame` containing gene coordinates for the specified gene symbol.

output.name: A `pd.DataFrame` containing gene coordinates for the specified gene symbol.

tool.help: Retrieve gene coordinates for specific organism through BioMart. Parameters ---------- host : {{'www.ensembl.org', ...}} A valid BioMart host URL. Can be used to control genome build. org : {{'hsapiens', 'mmusculus'}} Organism to query. Currently available are human ('hsapiens') and mouse ('mmusculus'). gene : The gene symbol (e.g. 'hgnc_symbol' for human) for which to retrieve coordinates. chr_exclude : A list of chromosomes to exclude from query. Returns ------- A `pd.DataFrame` containing gene coordinates for the specified gene symbol.
